clinical_study.brief_title: PACAREG: a Multicenter Registry Trial in Pancreatic Ductal Adencarcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: PaCaReg: A Multicenter Registry Trial for the Assessement of Clinical, Epidemiological and Biological Profiles in Patients With Pancreatic Ductal Adenocarcinoma

brief_summary.textblock: PaCaReg is a multicenter registry trial aiming in the assessement of clinical, epidemiological and biological profiles in patients with pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma

primary_outcome.measure: General assessment of applied therapy modalities in pancreatic cancer
primary_outcome.time_frame: First diagnose to death or end of surveillance (5 years after curative resection)

primary_outcome.time_frame: First diagnose to death or end of surveillance (5 years after curative resection)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First diagnose to death or end of surveillance (5 years after curative resection)

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of tumor surveillance in pancreatic cancer patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First diagnose to death or end of surveillance (5 years after curative resection)

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of predictive and prognostic markers
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First diagnose to death or end of surveillance (5 years after curative resection)

biospec_descr.textblock:
- Tumor tissue from biopsies or surgery
- Blood samples at defined timepoints

study_pop.textblock: All adult newly diagnosed patients with a PDAC could be included in the registry trial.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Treatment naive histologically or cytologically proven pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma (PDAC) or highly suspicious diagnosis (only pre-curative-intended resection)
- Age =>18 years
- written informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- papillary cancer
- neuroendocrine pancreatic tumors
